name.description: The name of the R-package, e.g. 'PackageName'

link.description: The link to the R-package, e.g. 'https://cran.r-project.org/package=PackageName'

CSADocPkg.description: Computer Software Assurance Documentation Package for a software package in R; Example: t.test

name.description: The name of the function, e.g. 'Function A'

definition.const: Scripted testing efforts in which the risk of the computer system or automation includes evidence of repeatability, traceability to requirements, and auditability.

testObjectives.description: An array of objects representing the test objectives

uuid.description: A unique identifier for the test objective, e.g. '6cde1b0f-3e41-4878-8cd5-79c87be88a7d'

objective.description: The main goal of the test objective, e.g. 'Verify that p values produced by stats::t.test are uniformly distributed'

keywords.description: Keywords related to the test objective

testCases.description: An array of test cases related to the test objective

uuid.description: A unique identifier for the test case, e.g. '4fa03a8d-2e39-4866-9cd3-69b77bd78a6b'

testName.description: The name of the test case, e.g. 't test produces calibrated p values'

description.description: A brief description of the test case, e.g. 'This test checks that the p values produced by stats::t.test do not deviate substantially from the expected uniform distribution.'

result.description: The result of the test case, either 'pass' or 'fail'

environment.description: The environment in which the test case is executed

container.description: The container used for the test case, e.g. 'rocker/tidyverse:4.3.1'

runtime.description: The runtime used for the test case, e.g. 'singularity'

runtimeVersion.description: The version of the runtime, e.g. '3.8'

renvLockfile.description: The lockfile for the environment, e.g. ''
